name: The Last Shaman
description:
You are the last survivor of the shaman tripe.  You wake up to find all people from your tribe has disappeared. You start your journey to find out what happened to your people. The journey is not easy, will you be able to survive? 

Death is not the end. When you die you go the spirit realm where you have to find your body to come back to life. You have to fight enemies sometimes to kill them or break their shields in the real world.
